post.title: Live-coding Wednesdays - codewithjason
post.content:
I have always wanted to start a YouTube channel talking about coding stuff. This idea has been kept with myself for quite a few years now, until recently I decided to take the initiative and do it.

I am going to start the first series "live-coding wednesdays" on my channel. Basically I will attempt to live-code a project in an hour on every Wednesdays. The first live-coding stream is happening this Wednesday at 19:00 GMT, the topic being "Create a simple todo list with Vue.js".

Stay tuned and subscribe!
